entry.title: Python Source Preprocessor (Custom Encoding)
entry.summary: Although you can pretty much do anything with the Python programming language, source code manipulation and metaprogramming isn’t really a thing. In this article we are going to look at how we can make preprocess python source files and add our extensions to the language’s syntax. All the code used in this post and more can be found here: https://github.com/shailist/python-preprocessor Exampl...
